news.author: Nick Chong
news.title: Margaret Mitchell: Google fires AI ethics founder
news.description: Google has fired the founder and co-head of its artificial intelligence ethics unit, claiming she violated the company's code of conduct.

news.author: Nick Chong
news.title: Nvidia limits crypto-mining on new graphics card
news.description: Graphics card-maker Nvidia says it will deliberately reduce the efficiency of its latest card by 50% when it is used to mine the crypto-currency Ethereum.
